Constructor Detail

SmilesFileReader

public SmilesFileReader(FragmentFactory fragmentFactory,
                        boolean checkSmiles,
                        int mode)
Creates a new instance of SmilesFileReader.

Parameters:
fragmentFactory - factory that creates fragments
checkSmiles - check Smiles for SmiLib rule conformity true/false
mode - indicates which kind of source SMILES (0 = scaffold, 1 = linker, 2 = building block) is read
Method Detail

readSmiles

public java.util.List<E> readSmiles(java.lang.String path)
                                              throws SmiLibIOException,
                                                     SmiLibConformityException
Reads SMILES from source files.

Specified by:
readSmiles in interface SmilesReader<E extends Fragment>
Parameters:
path - path/name of source SMILES file
Returns:
List of objects corresponding to source SMILES
Throws:
SmiLibIOException - thrown if an IO error occurs
SmiLibConformityException - thrown if a SMILES string does not conform to SmiLib restrictions
